title: Create a ScriptSearchComponent
description:
Building on the infrastructure created from SOLR-1725, a ScriptSearchComponent would be a valuable addition to Solr flexibility.

Performance impact will be a very important factor and need to be measured.

comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.content: moving all 4.0 issues not touched in a month to 4.1

comments.author: Erik Hatcher
comments.content: I'm not motivated or inclined to tackle this.  It's a nice idea, but SOLR-5005 can cover this sort of need, or other query pipelines that exist outside of Solr.
